description:
In the few days since the release of Boyce's first film, the response has been overwhelming. We got a lot of e-mail from people saying they loved Boyce's boy-next-door good looks. Of cource, almost everyone who responded wanted to see him get fucked!
It's always fun watching a young guy discover the pleasures of his own body. And when you can put him with someone who knows what he's doing, the "training" can be really hot.
Brett is a great "trainer" because his dick is always hard, he's very patient, and he loves to fuck ass.
To start things off we had a little surprise for both of them hidden under a pillow...
title: Fucking Boyce
